price: Onların söylediklerine sabırlı ol. Kulumuz Davud'u, o kuvvet sahibi zatı hatırla. O, hep Allah'a yönelirdi.
arabic: ٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلۡأَيۡدِۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: iṣ'bir ʿalā mā yaqūlūna wa-udh'kur ʿabdanā dāwūda dhā al-aydi innahu awwābun
